channel.title: JNI on Deep thinking
channel.description: Recent content in JNI on Deep thinking

item.title: A introduction to Android JNI
item.description: What is JNI #The full name of JNI is Java Native Interface, and as the name suggests, it’s a programming method that solves the problem of Java and C/C++ calling each other.

item.title: CMake Personal Understanding and Use
item.description: Preface #CMake is a build tool, through which you can easily create cross-platform projects.
